AND STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT S.STU_NO , S.STU_YR , S.STU_SEM , S.STU_NM , S.STU_TEL , S.STU_REG , S.STU_PIC , S.STU_BIR , D.DEP_NM AS depNm , DECODE (S.STU_RGB, 'RCD001', '휴학' , 'RCD002', '재학' , 'RCD003', '복학' , 'RCD004', '자퇴' , 'RCD005', '졸업' ) AS STU_RGB FROM STUDENT S, DEPARTMENT D WHERE S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT DISTINCT A.LECA_YR, A.LECA_SEM FROM STU_LEC S, LEC_APPLY A WHERE S.LECA_CD = A.LECA_CD AND (A.LECA_YR != #{YEAR} OR A.LECA_SEM != #{SEMESTER}) AND STU_NO = #{stuNo} ORDER BY A.LECA_YR DESC, A.LECA_SEM DESC
SELECT TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) year, TO_NUMBER(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') IN ('08', '09', '10', '11', '12', '1') THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) semester FROM DUAL

SELECT * FROM OBJECTION WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND LECA_CD = (SELECT LECA_CD FROM LEC_APPLY WHERE LECA_CD = #{lecaCd})
SELECT E.EMP_NM as "proNm" ,L.LECA_SEM ,L.LECA_YR ,L.LECA_NM ,L.LECA_CD FROM EMPLOYEE E ,PROFESSOR P ,LEC_APPLY L WHERE E.EMP_NO = P.PRO_NO AND P.PRO_NO = L.PRO_NO AND L.LECA_CD = #{lecaCd}

SELECT O.OBJ_CD, A.LECA_YR || '년도 ' || A.LECA_SEM || '학기' LECA_YRNSEM, O.OBJ_DT, O.LECA_CD, A.LECA_NM, O.STU_NO, S.STU_NM, (CASE O.OBJ_YN WHEN 0 THEN '승인대기' WHEN 1 THEN '승인' WHEN 2 THEN '반려' END) OBJ_YN FROM OBJECTION O, LEC_APPLY A, STUDENT S WHERE A.PRO_NO = #{proNo} AND O.LECA_CD = A.LECA_CD AND O.STU_NO = S.STU_NO

SELECT (CASE O.OBJ_YN WHEN 0 THEN '승인대기' WHEN 1 THEN '승인' WHEN 2 THEN '반려' END) OBJ_YN, O.LECA_CD, A.LECA_NM, A.LECA_YR || '년도 ' || A.LECA_SEM || '학기' LECA_YRNSEM, TO_CHAR(O.OBJ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') OBJ_DTT, C.COL_NM || ' ' || D.DEP_NM COL_DEP, S.STU_YR || '학년(' || S.STU_SEM || '학기)' YR_SEM, S.STU_NO, STU_NM, DECODE(A.LECA_GRADE,0,'PASS',1,'GRADE') LECA_GRADE, SL.SL_SCORE SL_SCORE, O.OBJ_TTL, O.OBJ_CON, O.OBJ_RPL, O.OBJ_DT FROM OBJECTION O, LEC_APPLY A, STUDENT S, DEPARTMENT D, COLLEGE C, STU_LEC SL WHERE O.OBJ_CD = #{objCd} AND A.LECA_CD = O.LECA_CD AND S.STU_NO = O.STU_NO AND S.STU_NO = SL.STU_NO AND SL.LECA_CD = A.LECA_CD AND S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND D.COL_CD = C.COL_CD
